prompt: Translate the following text from {source_lang} to {target_lang}.\n{source_text}
prompt_src: Translate the following text from {source_lang} to {target_lang}.\n{source_text}

prompt: Translate the following line from\n{source_lang} to {target_lang}.\nBe very literal, and only translate the content of the line, do not add any explanations: {source_line}
prompt_src: Translate the following line from\n{source_lang} to {target_lang}.\nBe very literal, and only translate the content of the line, do not add any explanations: {source_line}
